author: CBS News
title: ASPCA sees 70% increase in LA, NYC fosters amid pandemic
description: As the coronavirus crisis has unfolded across the country, shelters and rescue organizations have plead with people to foster or adopt, and the response has been fast and furious. The ASPCA says it’s experienced a 70% increase in the number of fosters in both…
